extendedInfo.description: Singapore Weather helps you get weather forecasts information easily. It has forecast information for 3 hours, today, 3 days; rain information map; readings information like temp, wind, rainfall and humidity map; air quality map, like PM value, PSI value, haze, pollution standard index. All the data come from NEA (Singapore National Environment Agency)SG Weather information:*) Forecast: today, 3 days, 12hrs, 3hrd;*) Rain: light, heavy;*) Readings: Temp, Wind, Rainfall, Humidity, UV index;*) Air Quality: 24hr PSI, PM 2.5 Concentrations, sg haze;*) Text forecast: North, South, East, West, Central;SG Weather Features:*) Show the weather in graph*) Show Singapore local weather informationKeywords: sg haze, sg nea, sg forecast, sg rain, sg temp, Singapore rainfall, sg humidity, sg air quality.

reviews.title: All SGP weather info that I need
reviews.comment: This App Provide all information I need to know abt SGP weather, incl. actual temperature readings, a rain map and PSI data. The only thing I do struggle with is the very smallish menu. That needs 12 yo girls fingers. Peter Kroll, Singapore
reviews.author: Peter Kroll

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Can seen things that i wanted to see.
reviews.author: Ronald Tan

reviews.title: Room For Improvement
reviews.comment: I was using another similar app but the developer stop updating the app so I switched to this. Overall there is not much diff. I wish the buttons and screen size can cater to ever-increasing screen size of our Android phones. It didn\'t look good on my Nexus 7. Also it would be great to include fortnightly, monsoon forecast, rain areas.
reviews.author: Martin Chua
